見にくい: (みにくい) - hard to see; obscure/indistinct/illegible
見にくる: (みにくる) - to come and see (someone, something); to visit
見に出かける: (みにでかける) - to go to see (something); to attend (e.g. game, performance)
見に出掛ける: (みにでかける) - to go to see (something); to attend (e.g. game, performance)
見に来る: (みにくる) - to come and see (someone, something); to visit
見に行く: (みにいく) - to go to see (something, someone); to visit
見ぬが花: (みぬがはな) - Prospect is often better than possession
見ぬ振り: (みぬふり) - pretending not to see something; turning a blind eye to; burying one's head in the sand
見のがす: (みのがす) - to miss/to overlook/to fail to notice; to turn a blind eye (to a wrongdoing etc.)/to ignore; to pass up (an opportunity etc.)
見まわす: (みまわす) - to look around; to survey
見やすい: (みやすい) - easy to see/easy to read; easy to understand; easy to look at/attractive
見やる: (みやる) - to look at; to gaze; to stare at
見ゆ: (みゆ) - (v2y-s,vi)    to be seen/to be in sight; to look/to seem/to appear; to come
見ようみまね: (みようみまね) - learning by watching others; learning by imitation
見よう見まね: (みようみまね) - learning by watching others; learning by imitation
見よう見真似: (みようみまね) - learning by watching others; learning by imitation
見られたものじゃない: (みられたものじゃない) - not a pretty sight; appalling; not a good look
見られたものではない: (みられたものではない) - not a pretty sight; appalling; not a good look
見る: (miru) - ver, observar, contemplar, analisar, avaliar, julgar; cuidar de, ficar de olho em, zelar por; ver (ex.: flores, filme)
見るから: (みるから) - (usu. as 見るからに) at a glance; obviously
見ると聞くとは大違い: (みるときくとはおおちがい) - (proverb) there is a great difference between being told about something and actually seeing it with your own eyes
見るに堪えない: (みるにたえない) - so miserable that it is painful to look at; can't bear to look at; painful to watch
見るに忍びない: (みるにしのびない) - So miserable that it is painful to look at; can't bear to look at; painful to watch
見るに見かねる: (みるにみかねる) - unable to let pass unnoticed; unable to be indifferent; unable to just watch (without doing anything); can't bear to see; can't stand watching; can't just stand by
見るに見兼ねる: (みるにみかねる) - unable to let pass unnoticed; unable to be indifferent; unable to just watch (without doing anything); can't bear to see; can't stand watching; can't just stand by
見るのも汚らわしい: (みるのもけがらわしい) - detestable to look at
見る人が見れば: (みるひとがみれば) - to the trained eye
見る度に: (みるたびに) - whenever (each time) one sees (it)
見る影もない: (みるかげもない) - mere shadow of one's former self; having no trace left (of former glories, talent, looks, etc.); unrecognizable (as the person one used to be)
見る影も無い: (みるかげもない) - mere shadow of one's former self; having no trace left (of former glories, talent, looks, etc.); unrecognizable (as the person one used to be)
見る目嗅ぐ鼻: (みるめかぐはな) - Yama's pole with a human head on the top (able to discern good and evil of the dead); (being a) fuss-pot/complaining about things in the public eye
見る見る: (みるみる) - very fast; in a twinkle; before one's eyes
見る間に: (みるまに) - quickly, suddenly (while one is watching); before one's eyes
見れば見るほど: (みればみるほど) - the more one looks (at it) the more...
見れる: (みれる) - ('ranuki' equivalent of 見られる)  to be able to see
見わける: (みわける) - to distinguish/to recognize/to recognise/to tell apart/to differentiate (both figuratively and visually); to identify (whether an object is positive or negative in some aspect)/to know the difference between something of superior and inferior quality (on sight or figuratively)
見わたす: (みわたす) - to look out over; to survey (scene); to take an extensive view of
見上げる: (みあげる) - to look up at/to raise one's eyes; to look up to/to admire/to respect
見上げるよう: (みあげるよう) - towering; astonishingly high
見上げる様: (みあげるよう) - towering; astonishingly high
見下げる: (みさげる) - to look down over; to look down on
見下げ果てる: (みさげはてる) - to despise; to scorn; to look down on
見下す: (みくだす) - to despise; to look down on
見下ろす: (みおろす) - to overlook/to command a view of/to look down on; to despise/to look down on
見世: (みせ) - (orig. an abbr. of 店棚;見世棚) store; shop; establishment; restaurant
見世女郎: (みせじょろう) - low-class prostitute who was kept in a sort of cage at the front of the establishment (Edo period)
見世棚: (みせだな) - display shelf (in a store); (usu. 見世棚) store/shop
見世構え: (みせがまえ) - store's appearance (esp. shop front, signs, etc.)
見世物小屋: (みせものこや) - show tent; circus tent; freak show
見事: (みごと) - splendid/magnificent/beautiful/admirable; praiseworthy act/feat/commendable deed; (usu. 見事に) utter (esp. defeat)/total/complete
見仏聞法: (けんぶつもんぼう) - seeing Buddha and hearing his teachings
見付: (みつけ) - approach (to a castle gate); front of a structural member
見付かる: (みつかる) - to be found; to be discovered
見付き: (みつき) - appearance; front of a structural member
見付け: (みつけ) - approach (to a castle gate); front of a structural member
見付ける: (みっける) - to discover/to find (e.g. an error in a book)/to come across/to detect/to spot; to locate/to find (e.g. something missing)/to find fault; to be used to seeing/to be familiar with
見付け出す: (みつけだす) - to find out; to discover; to locate
見做す: (みなす) - to consider as; to regard (as equivalent); to deem (as); to equate
見優り: (みまさり) - compare favourably; compare favorably
見入る: (みいる) - to gaze at; to fix one's eyes upon
見兼ねる: (みかねる) - to be unable to let pass unnoticed; to be unable to be indifferent; to be unable to just watch (without doing anything)
見処: (みどころ) - point worthy of note/highlight (e.g. in a film)/thing to note; good prospects for the future/promise
見出しラベル: (みだしラベル) - beginning-of-file label; header label; HDR
見出し語: (みだしご) - title word; keyword; headword; entry word
見出す: (みだす) - to find out/to discover/to notice/to detect; to select/to pick out; to look out (from the inside); to be wide-eyed (in surprise, anger, etc.)
見出だす: (みいだす) - to find out/to discover/to notice/to detect; to select/to pick out; to look out (from the inside); to be wide-eyed (in surprise, anger, etc.)
見分けがつく: (みわけがつく) - to be able to tell apart; to distinguish; to recognize
見分けが付く: (みわけがつく) - to be able to tell apart; to distinguish; to recognize
見分ける: (みわける) - to distinguish/to recognize/to recognise/to tell apart/to differentiate (both figuratively and visually); to identify (whether an object is positive or negative in some aspect)/to know the difference between something of superior and inferior quality (on sight or figuratively)
見切り: (みきり) - abandonment/giving up/forsaking; bargain (e.g. in a sale)
見切りをつける: (みきりをつける) - to give up as hopeless; to wash one's hands (of someone or something)
見切りを付ける: (みきりをつける) - to give up as hopeless; to wash one's hands (of someone or something)
見切り品: (みきりひん) - bargain or clearance goods
見切り売り: (みきりうり) - bargain sale; clearance sale; rummage sale
見切り発車: (みきりはっしゃ) - starting a train (or bus, etc.) before all the passengers are on board; making a snap decision/starting an action without considering objections to it any longer
見切り線: (みきりせん) - boundary; edge; break line
見切る: (みきる) - to see everything/to see all; to abandon/to give up; to sell at a loss/to sell off
見切れる: (みきれる) - to accidentally be visible (in a play, TV show, etc.); to be partly cut off (in a photo, video, etc.)/to be partly in the frame
見初める: (みそめる) - to fall in love at first sight; to see for the first time/to meet for the first time; to have sexual relations for the first time
見劣り: (みおとり) - unfavourable comparison; unfavorable comparison
見劣りがする: (みおとりがする) - to compare unfavorably (unfavourably, poorly) with; to be not so good as
見収め: (みおさめ) - last look; farewell look
見受ける: (みうける) - to catch sight of; to see; to suppose; to assume from appearances
